column4: Hi after a reboot a 2nd hard drive hasnt mounted. fdisk sya doesnt contain a valid partition table. I have ran testdisk. Any other options?
well, maybe that HDD does not have a partition table. :D
it did previously :) data on it and mounted with an ext3 partition. Getting worried since testdisk hasnt helped.
try again with another computer or reboot your current one.
